message: Just joined and took a quick look.  The name of private group should not show up in user's profile, it currently does.
I don't see a search box for the group itself. The search box at the top appears to be for all the groups. Shouldn't there be a search box for the group itself?

I'll keep my feedback to my own thread I guess.  One more: the site owners should be highlighted separately from the rest. I can't seem to tell who they are or are they even participating here in this group.
